Entry.JapaneseText: ボクにはサレが何を考えてるのか、 よくわかんないヨ……
Entry.EnglishText: I have no idea what's going on in Saleh's head...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……以前からだが、あいつは人が不幸になるのを 楽しんで見ているふしがある。
Entry.EnglishText: ...He's always seemed to delight in the misfortune of others.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……可哀想な気もするネ。他にもっとたくさん 楽しい事もあるのに、それを知らないなんて。
Entry.EnglishText: I feel sorry for him. There's lots of things out there that are way more fun, yet he doesn't understand that.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんなヤツに同情なんかすんなよな！ おれは、ああいう道から外れたヤツは大ッ嫌いだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't go feeling sorry for him! I hate guys like him who are rotten to the core!
